nodes.text: A Trandoshan male individual was a member of a wealthy and powerful clan on his species' homeworld of Trandosha. Prior to the war for the moon Alaris Prime between 39 BBY and 36 BBY, the Trandoshan sired a son, Pekt, who worked to expand the clan's empire as a slaver and used his father's fortune to research the biology of Wookiees, a species from the planet Kashyyyk who were the ancient enemies of the Trandoshans. Pekt's father was also the grandfather to Pekt's own egg-litter.
Pekt's father was mentioned in Pekt's DataBank entry in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
